<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Attributes

### EndIdx {#ae69eb440c6012c734dc7660d687f5859}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned&#42; llvm::SuffixTreeLeafNode::EndIdx = nullptr</>}>
The end index of this node&#39;s substring in the main string.

Every leaf node must have its <code>EndIdx</code> incremented at the end of every step in the construction algorithm. To avoid having to update O(N) nodes individually at the end of every step, the end index is stored as a pointer.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtreenode-h/#l00172">172</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtreenode-h">SuffixTreeNode.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### SuffixIdx {#a07edfdf6b8ffdf8dde528a79f255a781}

  prototype={<>unsigned llvm::SuffixTreeLeafNode::SuffixIdx = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a9038deca521822084ac798637368c94e">EmptyIdx</a></>}>
The start index of the suffix represented by this leaf.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtreenode-h/#l00164">164</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtreenode-h">SuffixTreeNode.h</a>.
